text:
@SethAbramson We have plenty of "folks in serious/critical condition."

They are just calling it 'pneumonia' and keeping them in hospital till they get better or die. They are not testing them.

I know 4 people who hospitalized with 'pneumonia'.
None were tested. One is STILL in / not tested
